seo.title: SustainSage | Coaching for transitions
seo.description: ICF-aligned, bilingual coaching helping you navigate relocation, career shifts, or returning to work at your pace.

hero.title: Calm, client-led coaching for real transitions.
hero.subtitle: For people navigating relocation, career shifts, or returning to work — in English, 繁體中文, 简体中文.
hero.note: Every session is co-created with consent. Coaching is not therapy, counselling, legal, financial, or immigration advice.

keyOutcomes.title: Key outcomes
keyOutcomes.subtitle: Short, grounding conversations that keep change realistic.

items.title: More grounded choices
items.description: Pause, surface assumptions, and decide with context instead of urgency.

items.title: Clear next steps
items.description: Name what you will try between sessions and agree how to check in on progress.

items.title: Support that respects your pace
items.description: Co-create experiments that fit your capacity, constraints, and responsibilities.

whoWeHelp.title: Who we help
whoWeHelp.subtitle: Situations where a steady coaching space is most useful.

cards.title: Mid-career in a new country
cards.scenario: You’re relocating or settling into UK work culture.
support: Make sense of expectations across systems you straddle.
Map options that keep your wellbeing and commitments intact.

cards.title: Graduates / early career feeling stuck
cards.scenario: First roles aren’t matching your values or strengths.
support: Clarify what energises you and what boundaries you need.
Design next conversations or experiments without overcommitting.

cards.title: Parents returning to work
cards.scenario: You’re re-entering paid work while balancing care.
support: Co-design routines that protect rest, caregiving, and focus time.

cards.title: People living between cultures/systems
cards.scenario: You shift between languages, policies, or family systems daily.
support: Name the invisible labour you carry and what you need from allies.
Create agreements that honour your limits without guilt.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: A simple arc that keeps you in charge of depth and direction.

steps.title: Intro call
steps.description: 20 minutes to check fit, set consent, and choose a starting topic.

steps.title: 4–6 focused sessions
steps.description: You lead the agenda. We coach, reflect, and co-create experiments that feel doable.

steps.title: Review & next steps
steps.description: Pause to capture learning, adjust agreements, or close when you feel complete.

starterPackages.title: Starter packages
starterPackages.subtitle: Three ways to begin — all can flex based on your consent and capacity.

cards.title: Transition package (6 sessions)
cards.description: Ideal for relocation or role shifts that need sustained reflection.
cards.ariaLabel: View services to learn about the transition package

cards.title: Grounding sprint (3 sessions)
cards.description: Short, steady space to reduce overwhelm and clarify one key decision.
cards.ariaLabel: View services to learn about the grounding sprint

cards.title: Ongoing partnership (3+ months)
cards.description: Regular coaching with optional async check-ins for evolving topics.
cards.ariaLabel: View services to learn about ongoing partnership options

whySustainSage.title: Why SustainSage
whySustainSage.subtitle: Grounded coaching from practitioners who live between worlds too.
points: Bilingual conversations across English, Traditional and Simplified Chinese.
Clear agreements on scope, boundaries, and consent before we begin.
Respect for rest, constraints, and the pace your body can sustain.

cta.title: Begin when you’re ready
cta.body: Share the transition you’re holding. We’ll recommend a starting package or signpost another support if coaching isn’t right now.
